results.title: Challenges and Management of Liver Cirrhosis: Practical Issues in the Therapy of Patients with Cirrhosis due to NAFLD and NASH.
results.text_hl: Treatment of concomitant/underlying metabolic conditions with statins or @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may also have beneficial effects on @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Portal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006975 @@@portal hypertension@@@, complications of @DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis @DISEASE_MESH:D008103 @@@liver cirrhosis@@@ and @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Hepatocellular @DISEASE_MESH:D006528 @@@HCC@@@ prevention.
